resources.string:
Developing new features and maintaining a Java web application for a client working in transport.
Whole lifecycle of the new features: Design, development, writing functional and technical specifications, tests, delivery and incident management.
 Fullstack web Developer : J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, Web services Rest, MySQL
Leading a 5 person team (2 juniors, 2 intermediate devs and myself)

Development of a medical mobile application monitoring psychiatric symptoms through medical survey.
Whole lifecycle of the application: Conception, design, development, writing functional and technical specifications, tests, delivery and incident management.
Worked as a Lead dev on the Android application and as a developer on the iOS version.\n\n\n
Also worked on the backend development, and the web platform used by psychiatrics. Java, Android, Android Studio, SQLite, REST web services, Springboot, Hibernate, Git

Conception and Development of an Android application prototype for an art exposition. The application was made to generate pictures from user input. 

Leading Design Workshops with the client and working on the whole lifecycle of the application: Design, development, test, test development, delivery, 

Java, Android, Android Studio

I developed a new compiler backend (C++=>C) for dataflow applications adding a C scheduler at runtime to improve performance on multicore platforms
\n\nBibliography, Compilation, OS, Scheduling, Parallelism, Dataflow, Architecture
Master of Research - Double degree with Lyon 1 University and INSA de Lyon Engineering school,Degree in Telecommunications, Computer Architecture and Systems
